api.name: cartpackstats
api.call: SELECT y.user_id, y.name, y.zonenum, y.lastscaninmin, y.pick_hr, y.totalpacks, y.maxmoddate, y.lasthr, TO_CHAR ( CASE WHEN y.pick_hr <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE y.totalpacks / y.pick_hr END, '9999') AS totalpph FROM ( SELECT x.user_id, z.last_name || ', ' || z.first_name AS name, x.modnum, (SELECT MAX (zonenum) FROM theo.usort_packer_stats WHERE lastmoddate IN (SELECT MAX (lastmoddate) AS lastmoddate FROM theo.usort_packer_stats WHERE user_id = x.user_id) AND user_id = x.user_id) AS zonenum, TO_CHAR ( (SYSDATE - MAX (x.lastmoddate)) * 24 * 60, '9999') AS lastscaninmin, TO_CHAR ( (MAX (x.lastmoddate) - MIN (x.lastmoddate)) * 24, '999.9') AS pick_hr, SUM (x.pack_qty) AS totalpacks, MIN (x.lastmoddate) AS minmoddate, MAX (x.lastmoddate) AS maxmoddate, SUM ( CASE WHEN x.lastmoddate >= (ROUND ( (SYSDATE - TRUNC (SYSDATE)) * 47) / 48 + TRUNC (SYSDATE) - 1 / 24) AND x.lastmoddate < (ROUND ( (SYSDATE - TRUNC (SYSDATE)) * 47) / 48 + TRUNC (SYSDATE)) THEN x.pack_qty ELSE 0 END) AS lasthr FROM theo.usort_packer_stats x, theo.usort_workers z WHERE x.user_id = z.user_id AND x.modnum = '1' GROUP BY x.user_id, z.first_name, z.last_name, x.modnum) y WHERE y.lastscaninmin <= 30 ORDER BY totalpph DESC
